sentences.en: A purported biography of him a fake.
sentences.cn: 所谓的有关他的传记是伪造的.

sentences.en: a purported two million dollar deal
Because, for all their purported benefits, probiotics are not medicine.
sentences.cn: 对所有他们谣传的益处, 因为益生菌不是药品.

sentences.en: But on the recording, the voice purported to be al - Zarqawi said he was not in Fallujah.
sentences.cn: 但是在录音带中, 酷似 扎卡维 的声音说他并不在费卢杰.

sentences.en: Chillingly, the state - controlled media have taken airing purported confessions from some of these prisoners.
sentences.cn: 更让人毛骨悚然的是, 当局掌控的媒体已经披露某些疑似入狱者的自白.

sentences.en: Experience suggests, however, that purported free lunches are vastly more numerous than actual free lunches.
sentences.cn: 然而, 实验表明, 想象中的免费午餐比实际的免费午餐多得多.

sentences.en: He is the purported author of the story.
sentences.cn: 他是这个故事传说中的作者。

sentences.en: I should note that purported free lunches are found on both sides of the political divide.
sentences.cn: 应当注意到,假想的免费午餐,政治分歧的双方都有所描绘.

sentences.en: Jackson's purported medical problems - and his sometimes bizarre demeanor - have been a regular feature of previous court appearances.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊所谓的健康问题以及不时表现出来的怪诞行为,在之前几次出庭时常常发生.

sentences.en: The document purported to be official.
sentences.cn: 这份文件据称是官方的.

sentences.en: The film purported to represent the lives of ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 这部影片声称旨在表现普通人的生活.

sentences.en: The letter purported to be from the governor.
the scene of the purported crime
sentences.cn: 传闻中的罪案发生地点

sentences.en: These have been retrieved from a purported crash in July 1947.
sentences.cn: 这种信息是通过据说在1947年7月坠毁的空间飞船上获得的.

sentences.en: Worldwide, people are fascinated with a purported Mayan prophecy that predicts a cataclysmic event in 2012.
sentences.cn: 在世界范围内, 人们着迷据称玛雅预言预测的灾难性事件在2012年.

trans.tran_cn: 声称是…，（装得）像是…的样子( purport的过去式和过去分词 )
